item.description:
Come and celebrate with your friends and family Bodhi Day with a multi-media presentation of the Buddha's enlightenment under the Bo tree over 2,500 years ago. Includes talk and discussion. Let's celebrate a what the Buddha discovered for humanity. This event a great for new-to-Buddhism. Presented by Senpai Sensei.

This event is great for families. Includes song, music and a Buddha under Bodhi tree.

From December to the first week of January, registration will be open for our most popular course, Buddhism 101 that explores the life of the historical Buddha and disciples, his teachings, the Eightfold Path, mindfulness and prayer, Zen and the Shin path. Visit our main web site for more details and sign up information. Open to beginners to intermediate.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
